name: Manipulative Charm
prereq: Vampire Dedication; Trained In Deception Or Diplomacy
summary: Against humanoids, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception checks to Lie, and to Diplomacy checks to Gather Information and Make an Impression. Once per day, you can cast charm as a divine innate spell using your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.
description:
Against humanoids, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception checks to Lie, and to Diplomacy checks to Gather Information and Make an Impression.

 Once per day, you can cast charm as a divine innate spell using your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher. Casting it requires staring into the target's eyes, giving the spell the visual trait.
